alwaysWatchHere.title: Always open YouTube videos here
alwaysWatchHere.note: label text for a checkbox that enables this feature for all videos, not just the current one

keepEnabled.title: Keep Duck Player turned on
keepEnabled.note: label text for a checkbox that enables this feature for all videos, not just the current one

openInfoButton.title: Open Info
openInfoButton.note: aria label text on a button, to indicate there's more information to be shown if clicked

openSettingsButton.title: Open Settings
openSettingsButton.note: aria label text on a button, opens a screen where the user can change settings

watchOnYoutube.title: Watch on YouTube
watchOnYoutube.note: text on a link that takes the user from the current page back onto YouTube.com

invalidIdError.title: ERROR: Invalid video id
invalidIdError.note: Shown when the page URL doesn't match a known video ID. Note for translators: The <b> tag makes the word 'ERROR:' bold. Depending on the grammar of the target language, you might need to move it so that the correct word is emphasized.

unknownErrorHeading.title: Duck Player can’t load this video
unknownErrorHeading.note: Message shown when YouTube has blocked playback of a video

unknownErrorMessage1.title: This video can’t be viewed outside of YouTube.
unknownErrorMessage1.note: Explanation on why the error is happening.

unknownErrorMessage2.title: You can still watch this video on YouTube, but without the added privacy of Duck Player.
unknownErrorMessage2.note: A message explaining that the blocked video can be watched directly on YouTube.

ageRestrictedErrorHeading.title: Sorry, this video is age-restricted
ageRestrictedErrorHeading.note: Message shown when YouTube has blocked playback of a video

ageRestrictedErrorMessage1.title: To watch age-restricted videos, you need to sign in to YouTube to verify your age.
ageRestrictedErrorMessage1.note: Explanation on why the error is happening.

ageRestrictedErrorMessage2.title: You can still watch this video, but you’ll have to sign in and watch it on YouTube without the added privacy of Duck Player.
ageRestrictedErrorMessage2.note: A message explaining that the blocked video can be watched directly on YouTube.

noEmbedErrorHeading.title: Sorry, this video can only be played on YouTube
noEmbedErrorHeading.note: Message shown when YouTube has blocked playback of a video

noEmbedErrorMessage1.title: The creator of this video has chosen not to allow it to be viewed outside of YouTube.
noEmbedErrorMessage1.note: Explanation on why the error is happening.

noEmbedErrorMessage2.title: You can still watch it on YouTube, but without the added privacy of Duck Player.
noEmbedErrorMessage2.note: A message explaining that the blocked video can be watched directly on YouTube.

signInRequiredErrorHeading.title: Sorry, but YouTube thinks you’re a bot!
signInRequiredErrorHeading.note: Message shown when YouTube has blocked playback of a video

signInRequiredErrorHeadingAlternative.title: Sorry, YouTube thinks you’re a bot!
signInRequiredErrorHeadingAlternative.note: Message shown when YouTube has blocked playback of a video

signInRequiredErrorMessage1.title: This sometimes happens when you’re using a VPN. If that’s the case, try changing locations or turning it off and reloading this page.
signInRequiredErrorMessage1.note: Explanation on why the error is happening and a suggestions on how to solve it.

signInRequiredErrorMessage2.title: No luck? You can still watch this video, but you’ll have to sign in and watch it on YouTube without the added privacy of Duck Player.
signInRequiredErrorMessage2.note: More troubleshooting tips for this specific error

signInRequiredErrorMessage3.title: This can happen when you’re using a VPN. You can try changing locations or turning it off and reloading this page. If that doesn’t work, you may have to watch this video directly on YouTube.
signInRequiredErrorMessage3.note: Explanation on why the error is happening and a suggestions on how to solve it.

tooltipInfo.title: Duck Player provides a clean viewing experience without personalized ads and prevents viewing activity from influencing your YouTube recommendations.
